text: The Governor of Gyeonggi Province () is the head of the local government of Gyeonggi Province, South Korea, who is elected to a four-year term. ==List== Political parties Status Term Portrait Name Term of office Political party Elected Took office Left office Time in office 1st Lee In-je 1 July 1995 18 September 1997 Democratic Liberal → New Korea 1995 Lim Su-bok 19 September 1997 30 June 1998 Independent — 2nd 1 July 1998 30 June 2002 National Congress 1998 3rd Sohn Hak-kyu 1 July 2002 30 June 2006 Grand National 2002 4th Kim Moon-soo 1 July 2006 30 June 2014 Grand National → Saenuri 2006 5th 2010 6th Nam Kyung-pil 1 July 2014 30 June 2018 Saenuri → Bareun → Liberty Korea 2014 7th Lee Jae-myung 1 July 2018 25 October 2021 Democratic 2018 Oh Byeong-kwon 26 October 2021 30 June 2022 Independent — 8th Kim Dong-yeon 1 July 2022 Incumbent Democratic 2022 ==References== Category:Lists of governors Category:South Korean politicians
title: Governor of Gyeonggi Province
